lesson.name: Quarter Note 1
description: Music is defined by rhythm, as a result the simplest notation represents the length of the sound
When the rhythm goes on, you can count each beat, the most common rhythm is 4 beats, and 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 1...
The length of a note defines how long it should occupy, a quarter note means a quarter of a bar, so it takes one beat
